# fig4

Test accuracy under different reduction ratio when applying PCA and the Meta Reduction strategy on IGBH small datasets with R-GCN model.  
The training follow the performance evaluation settings in Table II.

## run

First, run following scripts to test the accuracy of Meta Reduction under different reduction ratio, and place them into the `log` directory.   

```bash
./run_preprocess.sh
./run_test_acc.sh
```

Second, produce figure 4.

```bash
python draw.py
```

## Output
Executing `draw.py` generates two results: the figure `pca_drawback.pdf` (Figure 4) and a console log as shown below.
